body_html:
@SivanKe

warp-ctc is out of maintain, and cudnn.ctc is 20x faster

How to install it in linux? i use torch and thay said that:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-1a84affba9e0> in <module>()
----> 1 ctc_loss = nn.CTCLoss()

AttributeError: module 'torch.nn' has no attribute 'CTCLoss'

This is what i were install:

# http://pytorch.org/
from os.path import exists
from wheel.pep425tags import get_abbr_impl, get_impl_ver, get_abi_tag
platform = '{}{}-{}'.format(get_abbr_impl(), get_impl_ver(), get_abi_tag())
cuda_output = !ldconfig -p|grep cudart.so|sed -e 's/.*\.\([0-9]*\)\.\([0-9]*\)$/cu\1\2/'
accelerator = cuda_output[0] if exists('/dev/nvidia0') else 'cpu'

!pip install -q http://download.pytorch.org/whl/{accelerator}/torch-0.4.1-{platform}-linux_x86_64.whl torchvision
import torch

thanks
body_text:
@SivanKe
warp-ctc is out of maintain, and cudnn.ctc is 20x faster

How to install it in linux? i use torch and thay said that:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-1a84affba9e0> in <module>()
----> 1 ctc_loss = nn.CTCLoss()

AttributeError: module 'torch.nn' has no attribute 'CTCLoss'

This is what i were install:
# http://pytorch.org/
from os.path import exists
from wheel.pep425tags import get_abbr_impl, get_impl_ver, get_abi_tag
platform = '{}{}-{}'.format(get_abbr_impl(), get_impl_ver(), get_abi_tag())
cuda_output = !ldconfig -p|grep cudart.so|sed -e 's/.*\.\([0-9]*\)\.\([0-9]*\)$/cu\1\2/'
accelerator = cuda_output[0] if exists('/dev/nvidia0') else 'cpu'

!pip install -q http://download.pytorch.org/whl/{accelerator}/torch-0.4.1-{platform}-linux_x86_64.whl torchvision
import torch 

thanks
body:
> @SivanKe
> 
> warp-ctc is out of maintain, and cudnn.ctc is 20x faster

How to install it in linux? i use torch and thay said that:
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-1a84affba9e0> in <module>()
----> 1 ctc_loss = nn.CTCLoss()

AttributeError: module 'torch.nn' has no attribute 'CTCLoss'
```
This is what i were install:
```
# http://pytorch.org/
from os.path import exists
from wheel.pep425tags import get_abbr_impl, get_impl_ver, get_abi_tag
platform = '{}{}-{}'.format(get_abbr_impl(), get_impl_ver(), get_abi_tag())
cuda_output = !ldconfig -p|grep cudart.so|sed -e 's/.*\.\([0-9]*\)\.\([0-9]*\)$/cu\1\2/'
accelerator = cuda_output[0] if exists('/dev/nvidia0') else 'cpu'

!pip install -q http://download.pytorch.org/whl/{accelerator}/torch-0.4.1-{platform}-linux_x86_64.whl torchvision
import torch 
```
thanks
